name: x-auction
description: Welcome to the X-auction repo. This is a fictional e-auction application that's built using React, Vite, Node.JS (Several packages) and Bootstrap HTML/CSS. This project is meant to be an introduction to JSX (React) and several dependencies to create a fully fleshed out fullstack auction web-application. This project is still a WIP and more changes will be made in the near future!

scripts.install: concurrently "cd server && npm i" "cd client && npm i"
scripts.start: concurrently "nodemon server/server.js" "cd client && npm run dev"
